name: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Four - Escape Plan Bravo
name_original: Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Four - Escape Plan Bravo
description:
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Four - Escape Plan Bravo is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Tales from the Borderlands: Episode Four - Escape Plan Bravo is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
